QuestData.Title: Call to Arms
QuestData.Description: Our next strike against the ogres will bring you further east to Stromgarde. The living consider these gutted ruins worth clinging to. Their sentimentality is disgusting!$B$BAll that Stromgarde holds for us is a foul den of more ogres, waiting to be struck down. Travel there and slay their shamans and lords, and ensure what passes for leadership among the ogres is snuffed out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 7 Boulderfist Shaman and 3 Boulderfist Lords in Stromgarde.
QuestData.CompletionText: The ogres lurk in the corner of the ruins, away from the humans. Don't forget I'm only rewarding you for slaughtering ogres this time, $c. You can do what you want for fun, but don't expect extra credit.
QuestData.RewardText: Cleared out properly? Good. I doubt we'll even bother to lurk in Stromgarde. That ramshackle hole needs to be razed into dust.$B$BThe land would make a decent spot for a new Undercity in its place.
